ussr.model
Class Entity

java.lang.Object
  ussr.model.Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Actuator, Connector, Module, Sensor
public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object

Abstract class defining common behavior for entities in the simulator, namely the ability to have properties (strings with a key-value structure) defined on the entity.

Author:
ups
